courseDetails.title: Solving LeetCode's Top Interview Questions in Java [2023]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Expand your knowledge of problem solving and impress your coding interviewers.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome!

Hello everyone, and welcome to the course that will help you prepare for your coding interviews!


Specifically, we will be breaking down the easy collection of LeetCode's Top Interview Questions playlist. This playlist includes 46 problems that are very commonly asked by interviewers from large tech companies such as Apple, Meta, Google, Uber, and many more! We will learn how to approach problems of all kinds, such as those consisting of Arrays, Strings, Linked Lists, Trees, Dynamic Programming, Design, Math, and general knowledge, while also learning useful concepts and tricks which will help when facing more difficult problems.


What is LeetCode?

Simply put, LeetCode is a large repository filled with interview questions asked by the top tech companies around the world (Google, Facebook, Amazon, and many more).

The main problem as a new user on LeetCode is that there are ENDLESS amounts of questions that you can find on there so you may not know which questions are the most common/beneficial to go over. This course's purpose is to provide a solution to this issue, as I go over the Top Inteview Questions recommended by LeetCode. If you are looking to ace your upcoming coding interview or even just to strengthen your problem solving skills, then look no further as you have found the one-stop-shop to become a problem solving machine.

Course Overview

For each problem in the playlist, I have a video dedicated to explaining the thought process in detail which will lead us to the most efficient solution, paired with a visual to aid in explaining the algorithm. After we understand the approach for the most efficient solution, I will translate the visual into Java code, breaking down every line as I code it. After the entire solution is implemented, we will analyze the time and space complexity of the solution.
targetAudiences: Developers looking to solidify their problem solving skills and ace their coding interviews

courseDetails.title: ElasticSearch as you have never known it before
courseDetails.shortDescription: ElasticSearch: from basics to advanced search system, recommendation module, php/python/java integration at real example
courseDetails.longDescription:
Everybody knows ElasticSearch as a popular full-text search engine or as part of ELK but I am going to show you ElasticSearch from the side you have never known before. I want to show you that with ElasticSearch you can build very advanced search engines or even recommendation modules that can be much more effective and together with that, much more simpler than similar systems built on top of machine learning technologies. I want to show the real geo power of ElasticSearch for building advanced search filters and aggregations.

This course is built in such a way it would be useful both: for complete beginners and for people who are working with ElasticSearch but would like to extend their practice knowledge. It would be especially useful for those who are going to build some recommendation systems or advanced search mechanisms in the near future.

The course consists of 5 modules. First module is aimed for beginners and can be skipped by people who are already working with ElasticSearch. Here I will tell you about basics: how to install and configure the environment using Docker, how data at ElasticSearch are organized, why mapping is so important and what all that mess around tokenizers and analyzers means.

In the second section I will show how to build an advanced search system step by step on a real example of a simplified booking com version. We will touch the topics about ES geopower here.

Next course section is devoted to the recommendation module. Here we will speak about recommendation systems in general - about pros and cons of today's methods. And again together we will build a real system using ElasticSearch. We will create a recommendation mechanism for virtual example of cleaning houses' marketplace. 

In the fourth section I will show real examples using php, python and Java libraries for integration with ElasticSearch. And again we will create real microservice applying best programming practices and interesting design patterns like builder pattern or filter pattern. I will touch here also the question of debugging the possible problems.

The fifth and the last part is about using ElasticSearch for production. Here I will share with you my knowledge on how to set up a highly available cluster, how to calculate shard size and storage requirements, how to index millions of documents in the most efficient way and even how to preserve zero downtime at reindexing
targetAudiences: Software engineers, developers
Everybody who wants to build advanced search system at closest future
Everybody who wants to build recommendation system at closest future
Everybody who is interested at NoSQL databases
Everybody who likes ElasticSearch and want to get more knowledge around it

courseDetails.title: Natural Language Toolkit Assesment
courseDetails.shortDescription: NLTK (Evaluation & Test)
courseDetails.longDescription:
Please note that this is not a course, but rather an NLTK Evaluation Test.


The Natural Language Toolkit Assessment is a comprehensive evaluation designed to assess the proficiency and understanding of individuals in utilizing the Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK).

This assessment aims to thoroughly evaluate the participants' knowledge and skills in using NLTK, a powerful Python library for natural language processing.

By covering various aspects of NLTK, including its core functionalities like tokenization, stemming, part-of-speech tagging, and sentiment analysis, this assessment provides a comprehensive overview of the participants' capabilities.

Participants will be required to apply their knowledge of NLTK to solve practical problems and demonstrate their understanding of the toolkit's capabilities.

This practical approach allows participants to showcase their ability to implement NLTK algorithms and techniques effectively. The assessment will consist of both theoretical questions and practical exercises, ensuring a well-rounded evaluation.

The duration of the assessment will be approximately two hours, providing enough time for participants to demonstrate their proficiency comprehensively.

Upon successful completion of this assessment, participants will receive validation of their expertise in using NLTK for natural language processing tasks.

This recognition serves as a valuable credential that can enhance their professional profile in fields such as data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.

With this credential, participants can stand out in the competitive job market and open doors to exciting career opportunities.
targetAudiences: Data scientists and analysts seeking to enhance their natural language processing skills.
Machine learning engineers interested in incorporating textual data analysis into their models.
Software developers looking to gain expertise in implementing NLTK techniques for text processing.

Take the challenge without hesitation and start your journey today. Good luck!

1. Use Facebook Canvas Ads to Create Immersive Experiences


If you've seen Facebook Canvas Ads in action, it's possible that you were drawn to the capabilities but put off by the production process's apparent length. Canvas advertisements are a tangle of text, call-to-actions, still images, videos, and other interactive materials. Is the outcome worth the time spent?


2. Display Your Items Using Facebook Carousel Ads

A single, swipe-able carousel ad is ideal for showcasing various e-commerce items (or different areas of the same item).


With carousel advertising, advertisers can link to several landing pages from each panel of the carousel and display up to ten images or videos with ten separate CTAs in a single ad. They work well on both desktop and mobile devices and are available for the majority of Facebook ad targets, so don't feel as though you have no options if you're not aiming for online sales.


3. Increase Traffic by Using Page Post Engagement Ads


Your company's Facebook page already has a respectable number of likes, but are you having trouble connecting with the bulk of your followers? It affects a lot of firms frequently. Regardless of how interesting your Facebook posts are, Facebook's algorithm only gives your organic posts a certain amount of exposure. For example, if your page has 100 page likes and you publish anything to your account organically, it's probable that just 20 or so of your followers may see it. Page post engagement ads provide a reliable solution.


4. Facebook Video Ads: You Should Try It Since Everyone Else Is


What makes Facebook video ads so fantastic? One is that consumers who watch videos are 1.81 times more likely to make a purchase than consumers who do not. Another is that putting up the system is as easy as setting up an image advertisement. marketers may be put off from participating in the video ad market by the process of making the videos itself, but even those marketers may soon find themselves at a disadvantage. Over 500 million people watch videos on Facebook every day, and views of branded video content on the platform have climbed by 258% as of June 2017.


5. Get Leads through Facebook Lead Ads

Facebook lead ads, which are also a mobile-only option like Canvas ads, were developed so that advertisers could avoid directing prospects to time-consuming mobile landing pages. Lead forms are excellent for collecting names and job titles, phone numbers, addresses, demographics, and just about any other information that may be utilized to promote or remarket your products. Additionally, your prospects do not need to visit your website to provide that information because your lead form opens from within the Facebook app.

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Commercial Management in Construction field
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the Essential Skills and Knowledge of Commercial Management in Construction industry and Get Ahead in Your Career
courseDetails.longDescription:
Understanding the Basics of Commercial Management in the Construction Industry

This Basic course will introduce you to the fundamental concepts and principles of commercial management in the construction industry. You will learn about the role of commercial managers, the different areas of commercial management, and the relationship between commercial management and other disciplines.

The course will cover the following topics:

  • What is commercial management?

    • Commercial management is the process of managing the financial aspects of a construction project. This includes activities such as budgeting, forecasting, and contract management.

    • Commercial managers are responsible for ensuring that construction projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards.

  • The role of commercial managers

    • Commercial managers play a vital role in the construction industry. They are responsible for:

      • Developing and managing project budgets

      • Negotiating contracts with suppliers and contractors

      • Managing risks and ensuring that projects are completed on time and within budget

      • Ensuring that projects meet the required quality standards

  • The relationship between commercial management and other disciplines

    • Commercial management is closely related to other disciplines, such as:

      • Project planning and scheduling

      • Budget and financial management

      • Contract management

      • Risk management

      • Quality management


  • => Project planning and scheduling management       

             Project planning and scheduling is the process of developing a plan for how a project will be completed.

                    Planning and Scheduling Management Process:

                                   1.  Define the scope of the project

                                 2. Develop the project schedule

                                 3. Identify and manage risks

                                 4. Allocate resources

                                 5. Monitor and control the project

  • => Budget and Financial management

         Budget and financial management is the process of tracking and managing the financial resources of a project.

                  Budget and Financial Management Process:

                                   1.  Define the project

                                 2. Estimate the costs

                                 3. Develop a budget

                 Cost report or Financial report

                       

  • => Contract management

         Contract management is the process of negotiating, managing, and enforcing contracts.

                Contract Management Process:

                                   1.  Negotiating contracts

                                 2. Executing contracts

                                 3. Administering contracts

  • => Risk management

         Risk management is the process of identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks.

               Risk Management Process:

                                   1.  Identify the risks

                                 2. Assess the risks

                                 3. Develop mitigation strategies

                                 4. Implement the mitigation strategies

                                 5. Monitor and review the risk management plan

  • => Quality management

     Quality management is the process of ensuring that a project meets the required quality standards.

              Quality Management Process:

                               1.  Set quality standards

                             2. Measure performance

                             3. Take corrective action

                             4. Continuous improvement

By the end of this course, you will learn the basics of:

  • Develop and manage project budgets

  • Negotiate contracts with suppliers and contractors

  • Manage risks and ensure that projects are completed on time and within budget

  • Ensuring that projects meet the required quality standards

If you are interested in a career in commercial management in the construction industry, or if you want to improve your skills and knowledge in this field, then this course is for you. Enroll today and begin your journey to becoming a successful assistant / commercial manager.
targetAudiences: Anyone related to or interested in a career in construction such as Construction managers/ Engineers, Project managers/ Engineers, Contract managers/ Contract administrators, Cost Engineers, architects, Fresh graduates engineers, real estate developers and quantity surveyors

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to 'Mastering the Art of Internal Auditing: Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) Essential Training'

Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) is a professional certification offered by The Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA), which is an international professional organization dedicated to the internal auditing profession. The CIA designation is globally recognized and signifies that an individual has met the rigorous requirements and demonstrated the necessary knowledge and skills to excel in the field of internal auditing.

This comprehensive course is designed to provide you with a thorough understanding of the field of internal auditing, from its fundamental principles to advanced techniques and practices.

Throughout this course, you will embark on a journey that covers every aspect of internal auditing, starting with the essential role and importance of internal auditors. You will gain valuable insights into the Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) certification, including what you need to know to excel in this prestigious designation.

Moving forward, we delve into the International Professional Practices Framework (IPPF) and its critical components. This framework serves as the foundation for the internal auditing profession, and you will learn how to navigate its intricacies and apply them effectively in your work.

Risk management and control are central to the internal audit process, and you will develop a deep understanding of risk assessment, control self-assessment, and the significance of control activities. You'll be equipped with the knowledge and skills needed to assess and mitigate risks effectively.

Conducting internal audits is a crucial part of the internal auditor's role, and our course will guide you through the planning, supervision, evidence gathering, and reporting processes. You'll become adept at using audit tools and techniques, including data analytics and technology, and learn how to apply various sampling techniques in your audits.

As we progress, you'll explore continuous auditing and continuous monitoring, post-audit responsibilities, and the vital aspect of stakeholder engagement and communication. These elements are essential for ensuring the success and impact of internal audit processes.

We also address governance and business ethics, focusing on corporate governance, ethics, and professional conduct. Understanding fraud risks and controls is pivotal in maintaining the integrity of your organization's operations.

To help you prepare for the CIA exam, we provide insights into exam preparation and test-taking strategies. You'll gain the confidence and knowledge necessary to excel in this certification examination.

Finally, our course extends beyond the classroom by delving into career and professional development. You'll receive guidance on advancing your career as a Certified Internal Auditor and leveraging your expertise to achieve your professional goals.

Certified Internal Auditors are expected to adhere to a strict code of ethics and professional standards, and they play a critical role in helping organizations assess and improve their internal controls, risk management, and overall governance processes. The CIA designation serves as a mark of excellence and professionalism in the field of internal auditing.

Whether you're a newcomer to the field of internal auditing or an experienced auditor looking to enhance your skills and career prospects, this course equips you with the knowledge and tools to excel in the world of internal auditing.

Join us on this educational journey and take the first steps toward mastering the art of internal auditing and achieving your professional aspirations.

Thank you.
